channel.title: How do u get your server up and running using no-ip?
channel.description:
alright i have a thomson speedtouch 530 and i all still confused how to make your server online :confused: could some please tell me how to put my server online using no-ip i have looked at the following tuts and they kinda confused me
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,68913.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,68913.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,152670.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,152670.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,130597.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,130597.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,154683.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,154683.0.html[/url]
[tt]plz help me ppl[/tt]

item.title: How do u get your server up and running using no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Make sure you clicked runeserver.bat and it’s running. And make sure you even port-forwarded right and you made a no-ip. E.g. potnpkscape.no-ip.org make sure you made one of those and port-forwarded

Read full topic
item.source: How do u get your server up and running using no-ip?
